ğŸ”§ How ChatGPT Toolbox Works

Getting started with ChatGPT Toolbox is a breeze:

1) Install the ChatGPT Toolbox extension from the Chrome Web Store.

2) Download ChatGPT messages as MP3 files: Convert any message into an audio file by clicking the download icon next to it. Choose from 9 different voices to personalize your listening experience.

3) Export your conversations quickly in either TXT or JSON format with a simple click. Just click on the three dots next to any conversation in the sidebar, select "Export," and choose your desired format.

4) Organize your conversations into custom folders, keeping everything neatly arranged by project, topic, or client.

5) Pin important chats to keep them at the top of your chat list for quick and easy access.

6) Save and manage prompts for fast usage using our prompt management tool. Access your favorite prompts without retyping to maintain consistency and save time.

7) Supports bulk actions: delete, archive, or unarchive multiple chats at once to keep your workspace tidy.

8) Use the Advanced search feature to find specific conversations instantly. Search using keywords to locate exactly what you need in seconds.

9) Customize your interface by choosing light or dark mode and selecting from multiple languages to personalize your experience.
